item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 30 Apr 2024
item.description:
1. OCANNL 0.3.1: a from-scratch deep learning (i.e. dense tensor optimization) framework
  2. I roughly translated Real World OCaml's Async concurrency chapter to eio
  3. Using Property-Based Testing to Test OCaml 5
  4. OCaml Backtraces on Uncaught Exceptions, by OCamlPro
  5. OCaml Users on Windows: Please share your insights on our user survey
  6. Graphql_jsoo_client 0.1.0 - library for GraphQL clients using WebSockts
  7. dream-html 3.0.0
  8. DkCoder 0.2 - Scripting in OCaml
  9. Ocaml-protoc-plugin 6.1.0
  10. Other OCaml News
